abstract: South Korean Prime Min Lee Wan-koo offers to resign in response to growing scandal over bribery allegations; Pres Park Geun-hye, already suffering low approval ratings, is expected to accept resignation.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Lee Wan-koo has been under mounting pressure to step down after an allegation that he took illegal cash donations from a South Korean businessman in 2013.

headline.main: South Korean Premier Offers His Resignation
headline.print_headline: South Korean Premier Offers His Resignation

snippet: Prime Minister Lee Wan-koo has been under mounting pressure to step down after an allegation that he took illegal cash donations from a South Korean businessman in 2013.
